oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Statement of Samuel Barger in relation to the pension application of Shadrick Lee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Samuel Barger served as a private in Co. D, 2nd Tenn. Inf., USA, and gave this notarized statement for the pension application of Pvt. Shadrick Lee, Co. E, 3rd Tenn. Inf., USA. Barger stated that he was imprisoned with Lee at the Andersonville, Ga. Prison camp and described the health problems and disabilities suffered by Lee as a result, including shortness of breath, heart and kidney trouble, and swollen hands, feet and stomach. Lee was unable to work due to his health.
